## hpr1503 :: Making Waves-The DSO Pocket Oscilloscope

 
NYbill discusses the DSO Pocket Oscilloscope v3. A few test circuits are set up to put the scope through its paces. 


The DSO at Adafruit:
https://www.adafruit.com/products/468


The 555 timer chip:
https://electronicsclub.info/555timer.htm#astable


The script used to blink the Teensy:
https://www.pjrc.com/teensy/loader_linux.html


Pictures for the episode:
https://media.gunmonkeynet.net/u/nybill/collection/pics-for-an-hpr-ep-making-waves/
